meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the family Phocidae.
meanings.sent1: The biologist studied the phocine behavior of seals in their natural habitat.

meanings.definition: A seal or member of the Phocidae family.
meanings.sent1: The phocine basked in the sun on the rocky shore.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium welcomed a new phocine to their seal exhibit.
